de.eckhartarnold.client
Class ProgressBar 

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
              de.eckhartarnold.client.ProgressBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
public class ProgressBar
				
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite

A progress bar widget.

The progress bar is initialized with a "maximum" value (integer). And the progress is then updated with method setValue . An optional label displays the progress in text from, e.g. "5/12".

Author:
ecki
